backend/main.mo: Empty actor; no backend logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking features to modified frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing autogenerated summaries of various frontend game modules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variable definitions for light and dark mode UI styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry for the PWA including metadata, icons, manifest, and script loader.
frontend/PLAY_STORE_TWA_GUIDE.md: Guide for packaging the PWA with Bubblewrap and publishing to Google Play Store.
frontend/public/.well-known/assetlinks.j: Android TWA asset links config authorizing an Android app via certificate fingerprint.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining icons, theme, metadata, and standalone landscape display mode.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing install, cache-first fetch, and activation logic for PWA assets.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component registering the service worker and rendering SnakeScreen with Toaster.
frontend/src/game/animations.ts: Provides animation timing constants and a helper wait function.
frontend/src/game/assets.ts: Maps game asset image paths and includes a helper to compute candy sprite positions.
frontend/src/game/audio/audioManager.ts: Implements a simple audio manager with mute control and loads placeholder sound effects.
frontend/src/game/audio/sfx.ts: Convenience functions for playing specific game sound effects through the audio manager.
frontend/src/game/boardGeneration.ts: Generates initial boards without matches, creates candies, and refills empty cells.
frontend/src/game/boardReshuffle.ts: Reshuffles the board until it has legal moves, retrying up to ten times.
frontend/src/game/CandyTile.tsx: Renders individual candy tiles with sprite selection, special candy variants, and interaction handlers.
frontend/src/game/GameBoard.tsx: Renders the 8x8 candy grid and handles selection, highlighting, swipe gestures, and swap attempts.
frontend/src/game/GameScreen.tsx: Main game UI component rendering the board, HUD, audio controls, and overlays using useMatch3Game state.
frontend/src/game/gravity.ts: Applies gravity to the board, moving candies downward and reporting fall positions.
frontend/src/game/interaction.ts: Utilities for checking adjacency, validating positions, and getting directional neighbors.
frontend/src/game/legalMoves.ts: Determines if the board has any legal moves by simulating neighbor swaps.
frontend/src/game/matchDetection.ts: Finds horizontal and vertical matches and checks if a swap would produce a match.
frontend/src/game/Overlays.tsx: Defines game over and level complete overlay components with icons and action buttons.
frontend/src/game/progression.ts: Provides level configuration and checks if a level’s target score is met.
frontend/src/game/resolutionPipeline.ts: Resolves matches, handles special creation and activations, applies scoring, and returns updated board state.
frontend/src/game/scoring.ts: Defines scoring rules, target score scaling, and initial moves per level.
frontend/src/game/specialActivations.ts: Computes clear targets for special candies and detects special combo activations.
frontend/src/snake/Joystick.tsx: Implements a touch joystick with pointer tracking, clamping, and angle smoothing using a steering filter.
frontend/src/snake/joystickSteeringFilte: Implements joystick input filtering with deadzone, angle hysteresis, and smoothing to produce stable steering angles.
frontend/src/snake/logic.ts: Defines core game constants and functions for movement, wrapping, pickups, AI, and initial game state setup.
frontend/src/snake/pickupSprites.ts: Maps pickup IDs and types to sprite sheet regions and render sizes for food and coin pickups.
frontend/src/snake/RotateToLandscapeOver: Displays a fullscreen prompt asking the user to rotate their device to landscape mode.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeBoosters.tsx: Renders three disabled booster buttons with icons and counts using WZ asset backgrounds.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeCanvas.tsx: Draws the game world, player, AI snakes, and pickups on a canvas with DPR scaling and world wrapping.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeHUD.tsx: Shows leaderboard, mission progress, timer, and coin count using WZ HUD assets.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeMainMenu.tsx: Displays the game’s main menu with logo, instructions, and start/wardrobe buttons.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeMinimap.tsx: Renders a minimap showing player, AI snakes, and viewport bounds onto a small canvas.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeMissionCompleteO: Simple overlay indicating mission completion before the next mission starts.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeOverlays.tsx: Provides pause and game‑over overlays showing status, stats, and action buttons.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeScreen.tsx: Top‑level game screen managing state, input, overlays, canvas rendering, and orientation/fullscreen behavior.
frontend/src/snake/types.ts: Declares TypeScript interfaces for vectors, snakes, pickups, missions, and overall game state.
frontend/src/snake/useCanvasViewport.ts: React hook that measures container size and DPR to provide stable canvas viewport dimensions.
frontend/src/snake/useLandscapeOrientati: React hook that tracks whether the device is currently in landscape orientation.
frontend/src/snake/useSnakeGame.ts: Manages game loop, mission timers, input angles, and state updates for the snake game.
frontend/src/snake/wzAssets.ts: Centralizes asset paths for Worms Zone–style graphics including backgrounds, UI, and pickups.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and plugin setup for the project.
project_state.json: Defines project state for adjusting a Snake game to match reference images, listing existing features, a new feature request, and metadata.
